doctor.name: Prof. Dr. Md. Abdur Rob Sarkar
doctor.info: Prof. Dr. Md. Abdur Rob Sarkar is a Gastroenterologist in Comilla. His qualification is MBBS. MCPS (Medicine), MPhil (EM), MD (Gastroenterology). He is a Former Professor & Head, Gastroenterology at Cumilla Medical College & Hospital. He regularly provides treatment to his patients at Cumilla Medical Center Pvt. Ltd. (Tower Hospital). Practicing hour of Prof. Dr. Md. Abdur Rob Sarkar at Cumilla Medical Center Pvt. Ltd. (Tower Hospital) is 9am to 2pm (Closed: Sat & Sunday).

doctor.name: Dr. Mohammad Shah Jamal
doctor.info: Dr. Mohammad Shah Jamal is a Gastroenterologist in Comilla. His qualification is MBBS, FCPS (Medicine), MD (Gastroenterology), Training (Diabetes-BIRDEM). He is a Assistant Professor, Gastroenterology at Cumilla Medical College & Hospital. He regularly provides treatment to his patients at CD Path & Hospital Pvt. Ltd.. Practicing hour of Dr. Mohammad Shah Jamal at CD Path & Hospital Pvt. Ltd. is 2pm to 6pm (Sun & Wed).

doctor.info: Dr. Suman Dey is a Gastroenterologist in Comilla. His qualification is MBBS, BCS, CCD, MRCP (England), MCPS (Medicine), MD (Gastroenterology). He is a Consultant at Bangabandhu Sheikh Mujib Medical University Hospital. He regularly provides treatment to his patients at Human Diagnostic & Hospital, Cumilla. Practicing hour of Dr. Suman Dey at Human Diagnostic & Hospital, Cumilla is 2.30pm to 7pm (Closed: Friday & Sunday).
